wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Anthony McPartland (born 9 August 1976)  is a British Conservative Party politician and business consultant. He was first elected as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Stevenage at the 2010 general election.

link_mentions.page: Parliamentary committees of the United Kingdom

response: Stevenage is a constituency represented in the House of Commons of the UK Parliament since 2010 by Stephen McPartland, a Conservative.
